welcome: Hello Welcome to the Sonni topchi bot! Please select your language:
register_completed: ✅ Your registration is completed. Thank you!
warning:
‼️ Warning!
Please use the buttons below.
main_menu_button2: 🤖 Let the robot guess the number
are_you_ready_game:
Attention!
In this game, the robot will generate a number from 1 to 100. You need to find this number.
Do you want to start the game?
find_number_start: I have thought of a number between 1 and 100.\nGuess the number
find_number_complete: 🥳 Amazing, you guessed my number in {attempts} attempts!
find_number_small:
The number I thought of is greater than {user_number}!
Try again
find_number_big:
The number I thought of is smaller than {user_number}!
Try again
find_number_error_value: ‼️ Incorrect value! Please send a value between 1 and 100
